Ukrainian forces destroy large Russian landing ship, military saysUkrainian armed forces have destroyed the large Russian landing ship Tsezar Kunikov off occupied Crimea in the Black Sea, the Ukrainian military said on Wednesday. Wed, 14 Feb 2024 07:46:11 GMT IKI6O6AXVRMTTK6PXCEODLFCEY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukrainian-forces-destroy-large-Russian-landing-ship-military-says-2024-02-14/Reuters世界欧洲
Adecco pledged to find jobs for 85,000 refugeesAdecco Group will help 85,000 refugees find jobs and train 17,000 people by the end of 2027, the staffing company said on Wednesday. Wed, 14 Feb 2024 07:40:08 GMT HT6ECVSNUZOOVEP7KXLNQQ36CM https://www.reuters.com/world/adecco-pledged-find-jobs-85000-refugees-2024-02-14/Reuters世界
Ukrainian drones damage Russian landing ship in Black Sea, media reportsUkrainian sea drones hit and damaged a large Russian landing ship off occupied Crimea, Ukrainska Pravda, a major Ukrainian media outlet, reported on Wednesday. Wed, 14 Feb 2024 07:05:31 GMT LKQBSSSPAFJZLKSYP5FXHIBK4M https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-damaging- Russian-landing-ship-black-sea-media-say-2024-02-14/Reuters世界欧洲
Taiwan reports another Chinese 'combat readiness patrol' nearbyTaiwan's defence ministry said it detected 14 Chinese air force planes operating around Taiwan and carrying out "joint combat readiness patrols" with Chinese warships on Wednesday. Wed, 14 Feb 2024 06:52:12 GMT MN346NKYQZO4BPHPZE36GIMG7Q https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-reports-another-chinese-combat-readiness-patrol-nearby-2024-02-14/Reuters世界亚太地区
China's Pacific ally Solomon Islands expected to call election for AprilThe Solomon Islands is expected to next week call a national election for April, with China security ties emerging as a key issue as political parties launch campaigns in the Pacific Islands nation. Wed, 14 Feb 2024 06:40:12 GMT EOHLK47JSZPBVCGPD2RWFRBTHY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/chinas-pacific-ally-solomon-islands-expected-call-election-april-2024-02-14/Kirsty Needham世界亚太地区
Indonesian voters greeted with chocolates, candy on Valentine's DayHeart-shaped balloons, chocolate and pink candy welcomed voters to a polling station in the city of Denpasar on Indonesia's resort island of Bali during the presidential election on Wednesday, Valentine's Day. Wed, 14 Feb 2024 06:31:44 GMT 2S7UN4WCIRLPTJSYLQAKJXGTNQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/indonesian-voters-greeted-with-chocolates-candy-valentines-day-2024-02-14/Reuters世界亚太地区
Myanmar junta plans to implement mandatory military service in April, media sayMyanmar's ruling military plans to call up young people for mandatory service from April and also require retired security personnel to serve, media reports cited a junta spokesman as saying, as the army struggles to crush an anti-junta insurgency. Wed, 14 Feb 2024 06:02:08 GMT MTCHMENOKFMIDP6V6NIM3OUVIA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/myanmar-junta-plans-implement-mandatory-military-service-april-media-say-2024-02-14/Reuters世界亚太地区
Russia downs 9 Ukraine-launched drones, RIA agency reportsRussia's air defence systems destroyed nine Ukraine-launched drones over Russia's Belgorod and Voronezh regions, as well as over the Black Sea, RIA state news agency reported on Wednesday, citing the Russian defence ministry. Wed, 14 Feb 2024 04:34:46 GMT OSC2BDJP3JL6LHNAYXRVVSISK4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-downs-9-ukraine-launched-drones-ria-agency-reports-2024-02-14/Reuters世界欧洲
Protesting farmers clash with security forces on drive to New Delhi, TV reportsProtesting Indian farmers attempting to reach the capital New Delhi clashed with security forces for a second day on Wednesday, with drones being used to drop tear gas shells, television images showed. Wed, 14 Feb 2024 04:19:14 GMT PBWDLNQYKBIY7PGTYROSVDN774 https://www.reuters.com/world/india/protesting-farmers-clash-with-security-forces-200km-new-delhi-tv-2024-02-14/Reuters世界印度
Russia suspends annual payments to Arctic Council, RIA agency reportsRussia has suspended annual payments to the Arctic Council until "real work" resumes with the participation of all member countries, Russia's RIA state news agency reported, citing the country's foreign ministry. Wed, 14 Feb 2024 04:10:32 GMT WOT37DURAFNMJB7J2DONAGNLWU https://www.reuters.com/world/ Russia-suspends-annual- payments-arctic-council-ria-agency-reports-2024-02-14/Reuters世界
Japan PM Kishida plans S. Korea visit on March 20, reports Fuji TVJapan's Prime Minister Fumio Kishida is considering visiting South Korea on March 20, broadcaster Fuji TV reported on Wednesday. Wed, 14 Feb 2024 02:58:15 GMT UJTJJEY7W5LOLFGL2WY4ZQQOK4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/japan-pm-kishida-plans-s-korea-visit-march-20-fuji-tv-reports-2024-02-14/Reuters世界亚太地区
